titleStmt.title: Demands to be propounded of Catholickes to the heretikes by Richard Bristow ... ; taken partly out of his late English booke of Motiues to the Catholicke faith, partely out of his printed Latin booke of the same matter.
titleStmt.author: Bristow, Richard, 1538-1581.

notesStmt.note: Special t.p.: Certaine other demands annexed to the former. [S.l. : s.n.], 1623.
Running title: Demaundes vnto all heretickes.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
